examples: He was advised that it clearly might; that these mummers had no right to lay their hands on this public ornament, whether for the purpose of decoration or dedecoration

entries.meaning: (graph theory) Decimation (the elimination of points from a lattice); the inverse of decoration.
examples: Dedecoration did not produce any advantages in observing the size of the displacement of dislocations.
